SEARCH
Module ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers
Package ulb.infof307.g10.network.connection

Class DBAccountInteraction

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g10.network.connection.DBAccountInteraction
public class DBAccountInteraction extends Object
This class provides methods for interacting with the account database. It handles actions such as account creation, login, password changes and managing tokens.

    • getStatePacket

      protected Packet getStatePacket(Boolean successState, String messageSuccess, String errorMessage)
      This function creates and returns a Packet object based on the success state.
      Parameters:
      successState - , messageSuccess, errorMessage successState is a boolean indicating if the operation was successful. messageSuccess is a string that holds the success message. errorMessage is a string that holds the error message.
      Returns:
      Packet Returns a new Packet object that contains either the success or failure message.
